translations: v．捐赠，捐献：将物品、金钱或服务无偿提供给需要的人或组织。
· She donates her time to help the homeless.
她把时间捐献给帮助无家可归的人。

sentences.sentence: He frequently donates large sums to charity.
sentences.translation: 他经常向慈善机构大笔捐款。

sentences.sentence: Amy often donates money to charities. She is helpful.
sentences.translation: 艾米经常向慈善机构捐款。她很乐于助人。

sentences.sentence: One day when I was reading the newspaper, a piece of news caught my eye: "Rong Xing donates 100,000 yuan to help poor children go back to school."
sentences.translation: 有一天我在看报纸的时候，一条新闻引起了我的注意：“荣兴捐款10万元帮助贫困儿童重返校园”。
